Kachifo Limited bụ ụlọ mbiputa akwụkwọ kwụụrụ onwe ya nke dị na Lagos, Nigeria
Ihe odide ya gụnyere Farafina Books, Farafina Educational, Prestige Books na Farafina Magazine.
Farafina Books bụ onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ na akụkọ ifo, akwụkwọ nkuzi, tebụl kọfị, mmasị n'ozuzu na akwụkwọ ụmụaka.
Farafina bipụtara Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie's Purple Hibiscus nke meriri Commonwealth Writers' Prize na Half of a Hello Sun Yellow Sun nke natara Orange Broadband Prize for Fiction

Ndị ọzọ na-anata onyinye nke Farafina bipụtara gụnyere akwụkwọ Sefi Atta nke ritere 2006 Wole Soyinka Prize for Literature in Africa-winning Everything Good Will Come[Tinye edensibịa] na Nnedi Okorafor's Zahrah the Windseeker, onye natara 2008 Wole Soinka Prize
Prestige Books bụ ụlọọrụ mbipụta akwụkwọ nke Kachifo Limited.
Magazin Farafina bụ magazin na-adọrọ mmasị n'ozuzu ya na mbipụta ọ bụla nke onye nchịkọta akụkọ ọbịa chịkọtara
Ndị nchịkọta akụkọ gụnyere ndị edemede Uzodinma Iweala, Molara Wood, Okey Ndibe, na Petina Gappah

Ọ gosipụtara ọrụ nke Wole Soyinka, Segun Afolabi, Uche James Iroha, Funmi Iyanda, Dinaw Mengestu, Barbara Murray, Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie, Jackee Budesta Batanda, Helon Habila, Tosin Oshinowo, Patrice Nganang, Jide Alakija, na Nnedi Okorafor.
